item.title: Speechless npc's!
item.dc:creator: @teric6 teric6
item.description:

can you put all that text in line with the “bank here” pleas? it’d really help

item.title: Speechless npc's!
item.dc:creator: @eekz eekz
item.description:
@eekz wrote:

try this

if(misc.random(50) == 2619) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "BANK HERE!!"; } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1625) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "kill me for rares!!"; } }

Read full topic

item.title: Speechless npc's!
item.dc:creator: @teric6 teric6
item.description:
@teric6 wrote:

nope!

these are the ones that don’t work

if(misc.random(50) == 2619) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "BANK HERE!!"; } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1625) {<------from there downwards if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "kill me for rares!!"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1624) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "kill me for rares!!"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1575) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "kill me for rares!!"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1973) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "kill me for rares!!"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 90) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "kill me for rares!!"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 17) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "kill me for rares!!"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 15) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "kill me for rares!!"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "kill me for rares!!"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 2253) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "welcome to the funzone!!"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 2088) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to my chamber, yours is next door"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 805) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "This is my craft house"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 17) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "My house wkd"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 758) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to my farm"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 2244) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to Lumbridge"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 74) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Brainssssssssss!!!!!!"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 457) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "I need my skull"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1217) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Got to keep the flowers neat for the duke"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1398) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "have to get rid of the bad dirt"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1398) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "There are good fish here teehee"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1081) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to the Duke's castle"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 2069) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "The wankers locked me out"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 278) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "There's a monster down there!!!!"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 222) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Pray at the altar to please the priest"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 827) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Bob makes mine his ore, Waaaa!!"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 4) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "We're newly weds"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 355) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "I've been naughty and was sent to the corner"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 793) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "I ejjaculated into the food"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 609) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "we're watching you!!"; } } }

item.title: Speechless npc's!
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

Wait.
Try this.

if(misc.random(50) == 2619) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "BANK HERE!!"; } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1625) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "kill me for rares!!";<----------THAT DOESN'T WORK!"; } }

Read full topic

item.title: Speechless npc's!
item.dc:creator: @teric6 teric6
item.description:
@teric6 wrote:

when i add an NPC to my npc handler none of them speak

here’s an example of what doesn’t speak

if(misc.random(50) == 2619) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "BANK HERE!!"; } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1625) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "kill me for rares!!";<----------THAT DOESN'T WORK! } }]

Read full topic
